title: Former Big Brother star Jade Albany goes TOPLESS in raunchy Netflix series
text:
She was an aspiring actress and model when she first graced the small screen on the 2013 season of Big Brother.

And six years on from her time on reality television, Jade Albany has well and truly achieved her dreams of Hollywood stardom.

The 29-year-old recently stripped down for a sex scene in Netflix Japan's The Naked Director.

Scroll down for video

She isn't shy! Former Big Brother star Jade Albany recently bared all in a raunchy sex scene for the Japanese Netflix series The Naked Director (pictured)

In the series, which is about a director in the Japanese porn industry, Jade plays American porn star Allison Mandy.

In Jade's episode, the director leaves Japan and heads to Hawaii to film an adult movie with Allison Mandy.

She holds nothing back in the X-rated scene, appearing fully topless as she straddles her co-star.

Actress: Six years after shooting to fame on Big Brother, Jade has finally achieved her dream of Hollywood stardom (pictured)

Discussing the film with Telly Binge in August, the former reality star clarified that The Naked Director 'isn't porn'.

'It is not porn, but rather about porn and an amazing true story about a man who revolutionized Japan’s adult video industry in the 1980s,' she told the publication.

This isn't the first time that Jade has dared to bare on camera.

Not the first time! Back in 2017, Jade stripped off for Amazon's raunchy American Playboy

In 2017, she filmed topless scenes and showed off her derriere in Amazon's American Playboy.

The Ballina-born beauty has been working hard in Hollywood, recently filming a guest spot on the MacGyver reboot.

And according to her Instagram bio, she's currently filming an untitled comedy for CBS.

Flashback: Jade, now 29, first shot to fame on Big Brother in 2013, where she placed second

Bombshell: The blonde beauty was an aspiring actress and model during her time on the reality show

She first shot to fame on the 2013 season of Big Brother, where she was runner-up to eventual winner Tim Dormer.

During her time on the show, she was in a fake marriage with Drew Anthony, before falling in love with Ed Lower.

After leaving the Big Brother house, the blonde bombshell posed topless for the cover of Maxim magazine.
description: She was an aspiring actress and model when she first graced the small screen on the 2013 season of Big Brother.
